name: The Electrician Game
description:
This is a very early build of my latest game in development, The Electrician Game!

Features:

  • Input Options
    • Mouse and Keyboard
    • Gamepad
  • Smashable walls
  • Wiring puzzles
  • See through walls with the x-ray!
  • Interactable Environment
  • Fun and quirky cartoony vibe
  • A single demo level for testing game mechanics as development continues

The core mechanics should all function well, though I'm not sure what direction is going to take from this point. Should I lean into the puzzle aspect of it and add a timer/ratings to short levels? Sorta like Surgeon Simulator meets House Flipper...

Or should I try something different and tell a narrative using puzzle mechanics along the lines of The Stanley Parable meets Portal?

It's still up in the air, but if you have any thoughts, suggestions, or bugs to report please comment below or reach out to me on twitter @Ken_Rampage

Don't forget to follow me and this project to be notified of updates!

Having trouble with the browser version? Try downloading the Windows version.
